participant_1.name: Evelyn Parker
participant_1.personality: Evelyn is outgoing and cheerful, always ready to make new friends. She enjoys engaging in light-hearted conversations.
participant_1.background: She grew up in a small town and moved to the city for her career. She has a passion for art and often visits galleries.

participant_2.name: Liam Carter
participant_2.personality: Liam is witty and charming, with a knack for making people laugh. He loves deep discussions but can easily switch to playful banter.
participant_2.background: He hails from a big city and has a background in marketing. He enjoys outdoor activities and is a huge sports fan.
